snippet.title: Bastion - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Step inside the one-of-a-kind world of Bastion as the game's mysterious narrator sets the stage in this action-packed trailer. Get Bastion on Switch: https://goo.gl/zptX5H

Get Bastion now on Steam: http://bit.ly/nqyoJA

Get Bastion on PS4: http://bit.ly/1Fi7rcK

Get Bastion on XBLA now at http://bit.ly/rqp6UV

Stream the Soundtrack, including this trailer's music at http://bit.ly/nPbJv7

Visit us at http://www.supergiantgames.com/
